text: Pyroxamine (INN), also known as pyroxamine maleate (USAN) (developmental code names AHR-224, NSC-64540), is an antihistamine and anticholinergic related to diphenylpyraline. ==See also== * Benzatropine * 2-Diphenylmethylpyrrolidine * Difemetorex * Diphenylprolinol * Desoxypipradrol * Pipradrol ==References== Category:H1 receptor antagonists Category:Pyrrolidines Category:Ethers Category:Stimulants
title: Pyroxamine
